page_content: Discusses the implications of party changes for members of the Grosser Rat after elections.
Discusses the revision of cantonal regulations related to commercial registry.
Discusses safety regulations and concerns related to biogas plants near residential areas.
Discusses the declaration of an "extraordinary situation" in the canton of Graubünden due to the COVID-19 pandemic and outlines measures taken.
Announces traffic disruptions due to the "Challenge Davos" sports event on August 26, 2023.
Provides an updated guide for calving on summer and community pasture farms, which is part of the instructions for summer farming in the cantons of Glarus and Graubünden.
Reports on an incident where the cantonal police attempted to stop a car for traffic violations and asks for witnesses to come forward.
